headline: GTA Online
subtitle: SecuroServ
content: Have more money than youâ€™ll ever need? Then the SecuroServ VIP Protection Program is the thing for you. Register as a VIP via the Player Interaction Menu today and you will be able to recruit your own VIP Protection Detail to do the work that no one else will. Move forward with your newly named Organization, start your own VIP Work or Challenges and immediately start reaping the benefits of having a troop of armed Bodyguards at your beck and call.
